resources.string: This service provides enhanced accessibility features for our app.

if you forgotton your password, go to the login page and a forgot password-link is mentioned, press the link, A password reset link will me shared to your mentioed email address \n \n Note: if link not showing check if your content provider put it to the spam
if you find whtsapp sharing not working, go to your settings and allow accessibility serivice for notify app \n Settings ->Accessibility service ->notify app ->allow accessiblity

Hey Parent,\n Just wanted to reach out and share an important concern regarding your child\'s punctuality in college. It seems they\'ve been consistently arriving late to their classes, and we thought you should know. Being on time is a valuable skill that greatly impacts their academic journey.\n Thanks for your understanding and support! Best regards,
Your request will be send to the matching constrain your entered, once the owner approved, data will be automatically added to your selected batch.
You can set a name and pin so that you can share the data between people\n\n(Note:Data can be confidential, do you it on your own responssiblity)
